General.Name: Himalaya Shipping Ltd.
General.Description: Himalaya Shipping Ltd. provides dry bulk shipping services worldwide. The company serves major commodity trading, commodity and energy transition, and multi-modal transport companies. As of December 31, 2024, it owned and operated through a fleet of 12 Newcastlemax dry bulk vessels, each with capacity in the range of 210,000 dead weight tons. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Hamilton, Bermuda.
General.Address: S. E. Pearman Building, Hamilton, Bermuda, HM 11
